p:
We continue by comparing group-level media visibility across a large collection of digital and print media CC articles collected from the MC project
37 . Much like the WOS publication data, which is derived from various journals, our media article data is derived from a wide range of media sources—including print newspapers and magazines, as well as online media (e.g., online news sites, personal and society blogs). Figure 2 shows the most prominent individuals and media sources associated with the CCC and CCS groups, respectively.
